Class ServerConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.ServerConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataBaseConnector

    public class ServerConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataBaseConnector
    Class responsible for communication between server and DataBase having functions sending and getting data by specified pattern
